mapper.sql: id, activity_id, ad_seat_id, submit_time, user_id, status,reason,problem_status, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into ad_jiucuo_task (id, activity_id, ad_seat_id, submit_time, user_id, status, reason,problem_status, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adSeatId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{problemStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into ad_jiucuo_task
id,
activity_id,
ad_seat_id,
submit_time,
user_id,
status,
reason,
problem_status,
create_time,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{adSeatId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update ad_jiucuo_task
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ad_seat_id = #{adSeatId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
submit_time = #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
problem_status = #{problemStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ad_jiucuo_task set activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ad_seat_id = #{adSeatId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, submit_time = #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, problem_status = #{problemStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.activity_id, a.ad_seat_id, a.submit_time, a.user_id, a.status,a.reason,a.problem_status, a.create_time, a.update_time, b.pic_url1,c.activity_name,e.province,e.city,e.region,e.street,d.id as activity_adseat_id,d.media_id, f.media_name,e.`name` as ad_seat_name,g.realname from ad_jiucuo_task a left join ad_jiucuo_task_feedback b on a.id = b.jiucuo_task_id left join ad_activity c on a.activity_id = c.id left join ad_activity_adseat d on a.activity_id = d.activity_id and a.ad_seat_id = d.ad_seat_id left join ad_seat_info e on d.ad_seat_id = e.id left join ad_media f on d.media_id = f.id left join sys_user_execute g on a.user_id = g.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.id, a.activity_id, a.ad_seat_id, a.submit_time, a.user_id, a.status,a.reason,a.problem_status a.create_time, a.update_time, b.pic_url1,b.pic_url2,b.pic_url3,b.pic_url4,b.create_time as feedback_time,c.activity_name,e.`name` as ad_seat_name, b.problem,b.problem_other from ad_jiucuo_task a left join ad_jiucuo_task_feedback b on a.id = b.jiucuo_task_id left join ad_activity c on a.activity_id = c.id left join ad_activity_adseat d on a.activity_id = d.activity_id and a.ad_seat_id = d.ad_seat_id left join ad_seat_info e on d.ad_seat_id = e.id where a.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by a.id desc
